class A(object):

    def __init__(self):
        self.i = 0

    def sc(self, opt):
        """
                Test

                Parameters
                ----------
                *opt : str
                    _
                """
        self.i += 1
a = A()
cm = CLICommandWrapper(a)
parser = cm.parser()
with noexit(), stdout() as out:
    parser.parse_args(['sc', '--help'])
self.assertIn('opt ...', out.getvalue())
